name: Arathan's Visage
desc:
Extends the range of ballistic and energy weapons by %s. The range of point-defense weapons is only extended by %s.

Also increases target-leading accuracy and greatly increases in-combat sensor range.

name: Arathan's Armor
desc: Specialized plating fitted to the ship increases maximum armor rating by %s, reduces HE and EMP damage taken by %s and %s respectively. The plating also increases maximum armor damage reduction to %s.
short: increases armor and maximum damage reduction, reduces HE and EMP damage taken

name: Adaptive Mounts
desc: Reduces weapon OP cost by %s/%s/%s depending on size.

name: Arathan's Heart
desc: A near-arcane core fitted to power Arathan. This extremely powerful core reduces weapon flux cost by %s, increases flux dissipation, flux capacity, and vent speed by %s, %s, and %s, respectively. The core is also capable of dissipating some beam damage, reducing it by %s. This core also exhibits timeflow-altering capabilities, increasing timeflow by %s. However, due to the power of the core, overloads take longer, increasing the duration by %s.
short: reduces weapon flux cost, increases flux dissipation, capacity, and vent speed

name: General Weapon Integration
desc: Reduces weapon OP cost by %s/%s/%s depending on size.

name: Lakhesis General Modification
desc: A general modification for Lakhesis vessels, a better flux core reduces nonmissile weapon flux cost by %s, increases flux dissipation by %s, increases flux capacity by %s, and increases vent rate by %s. More robust systems increases PPT by %s seconds, while reducing CR decay by %s.

name: Lakhesis Implants
desc: Lakhesis crew are genetically engineered and fitted with implants to increase their performance in the heat of battle. The enhancements increases their gunnery ability, decreasing recoil by %s and improving autofire accuracy by %s for both ships and fighters. They are also more skilled at piloting, increasing fighter maneuverability by %s. Their heightened senses allows them to do tasks quicker, decreasing fighter refit, engine repair, and weapon repair time by %s.
